description: Generic social proof patterns for demonstration purposes
note: This is a portfolio project - patterns are for educational demonstration only

patterns.name: Research Finding
patterns.description: Shares insights from studies or interviews
patterns.example_usage: Research shows this productivity method works:

patterns.name: Common Practice
patterns.example_usage: Most senior engineers use this approach:

patterns.name: Peer Validation
patterns.description: Shows what peers or colleagues do
patterns.example_usage: My team started doing code reviews differently and productivity increased:

implementation_note: Real social proof would include verified data and citations
ethical_note: Always use accurate, verifiable social proof - never fabricate statistics
